ROOT.QUERY:
/***********************************************************************/ /* Query : Warehouse reception - Out of Sync Central (Status) */ /***********************************************************************/
SELECT ecdsite"Whs #", ecdcexcde "PO #", oe_fourn || '' | '' || oe_librs "Supplier code desc.", to_char(ecddcom, ''MM/DD/RR HH24:MI:SS'') "Ordered on", to_char(ecddliv, ''MM/DD/RR HH24:MI:SS'') "Exp. delivery date", to_char(oe_datrec, ''MM/DD/RR HH24:MI:SS'') "Received on", ecdetat || '' | '' || UPPER(pkparpostes.get_postlibl@heinens_custom_prod(1,10,502, ecdetat, ''HN'')) "Central status", (SELECT oe_statut || '' | '' || pi_libpos from tb_parl@heinens_stk_prod where pi_lang = ''GB'' AND pi_postex=oe_statut and pi_tablex = ''STA'') "Stock status" FROM cdeentcde@heinens_custom_prod, tb_erec@heinens_stk_prod WHERE ecdetat=5 -- Central - Awaiting delivery AND oe_statut=''3'' -- Warehouse CLEARED AND ecdcexcde=oe_ncdefo AND ecdsite=oe_donord AND ecdsite IN (91070,91071, 90061) AND ecdcincde=oe_cincde AND TRUNC(sysdate+1) >= TRUNC(oe_datrec)
ROOT.HEADER: Warehouse receipt not in synch with Central (status)
